title: The Mill on the Floss - interactions with father

content.prompt: Which of the following most aptly describes Maggie's interactions with her father?

choices.label: She strongly rejects both his praise and chastisement.
She expounds on the wisdom of applying Biblical teachings to his domestic problems.
She uses her religious seclusion to convince her father that she will not marry.
She fails to cheer him with her tentative words and gestures.

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe how textual details reveal nuances and complexities in characters' relationships with one another.
